A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie that takes a s**t on the fans\, and then tells the fans they are wrong. Hack movie\, Hack writing\, hack job to establish characters\, lack of character development for the new characters\, story arks ended at pointless times that destroy the overall story. ~30 minutes of the movie spent to show something that could have been done in 5 min\, when that time could have been spent developing Rey's story. just to name a few of the problems.
